attributes.review: This took like 3 hours to download and then it made my phone glitch terribly and turned the screen orange 😕so disappointed in this app😤😔😣

attributes.title: cinnamon hitler
attributes.review: i wanted to look at the app to see anything that would convince me that the orange was a good person ( i obviously didnt find anything ) and then a gorilla climbed out of my screen and started attacking my sister. she ended up in the hospital and we r hopeing she will be ok🤞. i do not recommend tis app especially because of the racist, homophobic, sexist, rapist (etc.) orange running it.

attributes.title: not good
attributes.review: it’s app is horrible. it does NOTT function good and i thing the President hacked my phone cause i can hear his voice constantly and it’s giving my nightmares.

attributes.title: APP KILLED MY DAD!!!
attributes.review: this app killed my dad from severe head trauma do not download unless you want your dad to suffer from severe head trauma and die!!!!! it’s sickening and horrible, changed my mind on my vote for the election screw trump!!

as soon as i opened up the app my cat was sitting next to me we were exited too look at the orange catalog then next thing you know a GIANT ORANGE POPPED UP ON THE SCREEN AND GAVE MY CAT A SEIZURE she died later that day rip buddy❤️ 
it's a no for me❤️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE KEEP READING!!!! 👹👹🙈

attributes.title: By FAR THE WORST APP
attributes.review: This app is just plain inefficient and inoperable. It completely glitches my entire system and many people should watch out. This app seems to be a complete scam!!!! PLEASE SAVE YOUR PHONE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: the app was glitching the whole time and naked girls were popping up almost every minute!!! as a women that is not okay at all!! i would never let my child get this app!!!
